metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9558 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: (1) libdwarf/dwarf_leb.c and (2) dwarfdump/print_frames.c in libdwarf before 20161124 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted bit pattern in a signed leb number, aka a "negation overflow."

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
